column1: Let Nancy Pelosi hold the articles of impeachment because the longer this drags out the more swing voters and independents are supporting Republicans in battleground districts. @NRCC @tomemmer   https://t.co/d7ihnEEYYp
@SchellerforPA is a voice we need in Congress.  She’s a strong conservative fighter.  Congratulations to my friend for kicking off her campaign this morning. https://t.co/DxiyCBA9ej
